description: Providing unique day and afternoon craft brewery tours in Toronto and Niagara with visits to small breweries and including a tour of one and flights of regular and seasonal beers at each. Ultimate Canadian Craft Beer Experience in Toronto, Canada's only craft brewery tour recognized internationally as a Canadian Signature Experience. Provides daily wine tours to Niagara and Canada's newest wine region, Prince Edward County for individuals and groups with return transportation to Toronto and surrounding areas. Includes experienced knowledgeable guide, visits to four wineries with a tour of one and flights of wine at each award winning winery, and lunch at a winery overlooking their vineyards or at a popular, local restaurant. More than 25 years experience organizing tours for small intimate groups and corporate visits.

reviews.title: Incredible Experience!
text: Cannot say enough good things about this tour. It was a wonderful way to experience wines from a number of different wineries in the Niagara region direct from our hotel in downtown Toronto with absolutely no hassle or planning required. Our tour guide, Jim, went above and beyond to make our experience great! I was extremely pleased with the value I got from this experience and I would highly recommend it to anyone visiting Toronto and looking to be introduced to Niagara on the Lake.
Delicious wines, delicious 3 course lunch, and an incredible day all around! Thank you again, Jim.

reviews.title: Outstanding Tour!!
text: A large group of us did a Niagara Wine Tour as part of a bachelorette party and it couldn't have been any better! We were picked up early in the morning and taken to four different wineries throughout the day. In between wineries we stopped for a nice lunch that was included in the cost of the tour.

Our driver Jim was exceptional and he made the tour an incredible experience for those of us on the trip that rode with him. His knowledge of wine and the Niagara region was also a great benefit! I am looking forward to booking another trip with Jim in the future!
Highly recommend this tour company!

reviews.title: Glorified taxi service
text: I can't see why we (4 adults) paid $600 to visit 4 wineries, and have a lunch. Save your money, drive down yourself. There was absolutely no tour included, private or otherwise. Completely dissapointing, and not worth the money at all.

reviews.title: Awesome experience - Toronto to Niagara Wine Tour
text: My friends and I booked for a 7 person Toronto to Niagara Wine Tour and had Jim as our guide. He was very helpful, was very knowledgeable and made sure to even inquire about what wineries we'd been to before to give us the best, new experience. We went to Inniskillen, Reif, Lailey and Fielding Estates - and the 3 course lunch was in a fantastic spot with amazing wood fire oven thin crust pizza. The chocolate desert wasn't too bad either! ;)
I love that we were able to arrange pick up at my condo - as I live right downtown Toronto.

The service at the wineries was great, even with a larger group.  We had a a special tour and tastings in a couple of private atmospheres - we felt all the staff knew Jim well and were really on their game.  Jim seemed to have impeccable timing as well - at every location we got there with only a few others around and as we'd be heading out the crowds would come in - impressive.
My friends and I had such a great time, we're looking for another date to book again - maybe the brew tour next time! I'd highly recommend this to anyone!!

reviews.title: Explore Toronto's hidden gems!
text: On Jim's "Where the Chefs Dine" tour we were able to explore the diverse food markets that Toronto has to offer. As well as discover hidden gems across the city and eat like the chefs do!

This chauffeured tour allowed us ample time to explore each location at our leisure without pressure to move on. I would definitely recommend this tour to anyone wanting to sample the delicious mosaic of food culture in Toronto.
What a great way to spend an afternoon. Thanks Jim!

reviews.title: You drink, they drive.......A great way to spend a Day!
text: This was our second time doing this tour. On making the booking, I advised Jim that we did this tour a year ago. He made to sure find out what breweries we had seen already (not just on the last tour but even through our own tastings) and he arranged a customized tour so that we would get to experience a whole new set of breweries. Both Jim and Bill are great tour guides with genuine, classic customer service and a desire to please. I would recommend this tour to anyone who enjoys a few brews. The breweries all make sure you aren't thirsty and Jim and Bill make sure you get to the next one on time....teamwork at its best!!

reviews.title: Ontario Craft Brewery Tour
text: We toured 3 GTA micro breweries (Mill Street, Black Oak and Great Lakes) and sampled some fine craft beers. We had a detailed tour with a brewmaster and learned a lot. The chauffeur/guide was great. I would not hesitate to recommend this tour to anyone. They also have other types of tours. Great value and a great gift idea for family or friends.
